subject: interférence Simsonn plus Ali express Order ID : 3047890062248319
description_text:
Hello, I ordered a Simsonn Plus from your AliExpress store on January 4,
2025.

I've only used it a few times, but today I'm having a problem with a
micro-pulse coming from your control box.
The ground connection is correct.
I've tried several things: changing the cable, disconnecting the pedal, but
nothing solves the problem.
Can you help me?

Sincerely

conversations.body_text:
Bonjour , j'ai effectuer vos conseil , malheureusement le problème précite
toujours, je vous ai déjà contacté sur Aliexpress sans retours de votre
part après plusieurs relance d'ou mon contacte par mail

Le mar. 18 nov. 2025 à 08:42, General and sales enquiries <
service@simsonn.com> a écrit :

> Hello, please provide your order number so we can contact you.
>
> Please download the latest version of the pedal management software:
> http://download.simsonn.com/simsonnmanager.
>
> In the software, go to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update. After
> completing the firmware update, run the test to verify functionality.
>
> Please note that you need to test again after the upgrade. The pedal
> control box needs to be connected to a computer's USB 3.0 interface. If you
> still have problems after these steps, please contact us on AliExpress,
> providing photos or videos so we can check the problem.
>
> ------------------------------
> support@simsonn.com
>
>
> *发件人：* Anthony Landolphe <antho88130@gmail.com>
> *发送时间：* 2025-11-17 21:54
> *收件人：* service
